title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. D, pt. 2207 - Proceedings Before District Rent Administrator
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. D, pt. 2207 - Proceedings Before District Rent Administrator

State Regulations
§ 2207.1 - Proceedings instituted by landlord or tenant in district rent office
§ 2207.2 - Proceedings instituted by district rent administrator on his own initiative
§ 2207.3 - Notice to parties affected
§ 2207.4 - Answer
§ 2207.5 - Action by district rent administrator
§ 2207.6 - Final determination by district rent administrator
§ 2207.7 - Pending proceedings
§ 2207.8 - Modification or revocation of orders

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. D, pt. 2207

Statutory authority: L. 1983, ch. 403

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
